pageContext.claim: “It's also clear that we have won Georgia. We're up by 2.5% or 117,000 votes with only 7% left. They're never gonna catch us. They can't catch us.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump prematurely declared victory in Georgia. Within a day, the margin had shrunk to about 1,900 votes, out of about 4.9 million counted, with under 10,000 to be counted in mostly Democratic-leaning areas. He ultimately lost the state more more than 11,000 votes -- a loss confirmed through rounds of recounts and court challenges.
